title: 求助，BC端无法正常进入服务器
author: Misaka__Mikoto
txt_content:
BC端报错： Kicked whilst connecting to lobby: You are already connected to this proxy!
BC大厅：127.0.0.1:25575
主生存服务器：127.0.0.1:16510
BC端配置文件

prevent_proxy_connections: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25575
  max_players: 20
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
remote_ping_cache: -1
network_compression_threshold: 256
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
log_pings: true
connection_throttle_limit: 3
server_connect_timeout: 5000
timeout: 30000
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
remote_ping_timeout: 5000
connection_throttle: 4000
log_commands: false
stats: 5dd8073d-b23d-44e2-a32b-9cc62b83cae8
online_mode: false
forge_support: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
servers:
  Survival:
    motd: CoastSurvival Survival
    address: 127.0.0.1:16510
    restricted: false
  lobby:
    motd: CoastSurvival Hall
    address: 127.0.0.1:25575
    restricted: false




求助，该如何修改，才能够进入游戏

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
prevent_proxy_connections: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false

  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
  max_players: 20
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
remote_ping_cache: -1
network_compression_threshold: 256
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload

connection_throttle_limit: 3
server_connect_timeout: 5000
timeout: 30000
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
groups:

  - admin
remote_ping_timeout: 5000
connection_throttle: 4000
log_commands: false
stats: 5dd8073d-b23d-44e2-a32b-9cc62b83cae8
online_mode: false
forge_support: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
servers:
  Survival:
    motd: CoastSurvival Survival
    address: 127.0.0.1:16510
    restricted: false
  lobby:
    motd: CoastSurvival Hall
    address: 127.0.0.1:25575
    restricted: false复制代码

将   host: 0.0.0.0:25575 修改为   host: 0.0.0.0:25577 即可
然后用 IP:25577 进入游戏

replies.author: 寂华
replies.txt_content:
大厅的端口号改一下
随便换一个就行

replies.author: 神奇的FKO
replies.txt_content: 其实我也不知道，只是想混个帖子

replies.author: Misaka__Mikoto
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-6-30 19:25
将   host: 0.0.0.0:25575 修改为   host: 0.0.0.0:25577 即可
然后用 IP:25577 进入游戏 ...
好的，我看看先
大厅的端口是否改了 提供一下显示什么

replies.author: Misaka__Mikoto
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-6-30 19:25
将   host: 0.0.0.0:25575 修改为   host: 0.0.0.0:25577 即可
然后用 IP:25577 进入游戏 ...
谢谢，成功了
